name: DRRevealViewController
summary: An iOS sliding menu similar to what the Eurosport iphone app has
description:
The (at the time of this writing) latest Eurosport app has a nice sliding menu. I wanted to have one of my own i a project I'm writing so I made this reveal view controller. 

			In case anyone else would love to have one too, I decided to make it public via github and CocoaPods.

			Please tell me if you find any bugs or have any requests for features.
